Title: Relates to abandoned dwellings in N.Y. city
Summary: Relates to abandoned dwellings in any city with a population of one million or more; authorizes such city to declare dwellings abandoned; requires the owner to seal such dwelling within 30 days and if such owner does not, the city may then impose a lien on the property for the cost thereof.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd Art 19-A Art Head, §§1970 - 1974, add §1975, RPAP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to abandoned dwellings in any city with a population of one million or more
